title: e-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design for MOOC Sustainability and Completion Rate Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three individual/job/instructional design factors influencing MOOC completion rates.
Learners can apply at least two sustainability strategies when designing project-based activities suitable for the xMOOC model.
Learners can propose at least three formative assessment methods feasible in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
